page.title: 02ATTITUDES, HOLT WORCS.
page.content: {Conservation}is very much on the minds of land owners. A good proportion of the agricultural land which has had sand and gravel extracted from it has now been infilled and much decicuous tree planting has taken place. Careful thought appears to have been given in making the countryside aesthetically pleasing to the eye once again. {The European Economic Community}was regarded as beneficial for ten years, but with recent changes in subsidies farmers' attitudes have changed and they are perpetually seeking new crops for financial benefit.
